question: Which company has built the Indian Coast Guard’s interceptor C 453?
explanation:
The Indian Coast Guard’s Interceptor Boats C-453 was commissioned recently in Chennai. This is the 17th vessel out of the 18 number of Interceptor Boats being indigenously built by Larsen & Toubro Ltd.
This vessel has a maximum speed of 45 knots (85 kmph) and is a versatile surveillance machine.
